alert.note: Alert for Benzie (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:22PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact Benzie County through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Frankfort, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Frankfort, Thompsonville, Beulah, Benzonia, Elberta, Honor, Lake Ann, Platte Township, Bendon, Wallin and Blaine Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
